TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_TITLE: Welcome to the Ionic Super Starter
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: The Ionic Super Starter is a fully-featured Ionic starter with many pre-built pages and best practices.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_TITLE: How to use the Super Starter
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: Assemble the various page types you want and remove the ones you don't. We've provided many common mobile app page layouts, like login and signup pages, tabs, and this tutorial page.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: Need help? Check out the Super Starter README for a full tutorial
LOGIN_ERROR: Unable to sign in. Please check your account information and try again

SIGNUP_ERROR: Unable to create account. Please check your account information and try again.
ERROR-SIGNUP-LASTNAME: Please enter a valid family name
ERROR-SIGNUP-AGE: You have to be at least of age 18 to register for DigiBank
ERROR-SIGNUP-MAIL: Please enter a valid mail address
ERROR-SIGNUP-PASSWORD: Please enter a secure password: At least 8 characters, one upper case, one lower case. one number and one special character
ERROR-SIGNUP-PHONE: Please enter a valid phone numer without any breaks or special characters
ERROR-SIGNUP-ZIP: A german postal code has 5 numbers
ERROR-SIGNUP-NATION: Please enter an existent nation or country
SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search the items list, e.g. "Donald Duck"
ABOUT_US: Welcome to DIGIBANK, your number one source for all online Banking things. We are dedicated to giving you the very best of Bank account, with a focus on security on your money and great customer service. Founded in 2018 by Chi, Raakulan, Santiago and Simon, DIGIBANK has come a long way from its beginnings in from Frankfurt University of Applied Sciences. When we started our project, we thought about all the other provider and decided to implement a new unique online Banking, where the Customer is our first priority. We now serve customers all over Germany, and are thrilled to be a part of the new outstanding wing of the finance industry. We hope you enjoy our product as much as we enjoy offering them to you. If you have any questions or comments, please do not hesitate to contact us. Sincerely, DIGIBANK Team
AU_HISTORY_TXT1: DIGIBANK was founded in 2018 as Software Project Module from Computer Sciences Course at Frankfurt University of Applied Sciences. DIGIBANK was founded by Chi, Raakulan, Santiago and Simon.
AU_HISTORY_TXT2: We are dedicated to giving you the very best of a bank account, with a focus on grad service for our Customer.
